trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" /> and <see langword="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos de <see langword="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" /> e de <see langword="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos ocorrem quando a disponibilidade da rede é alterada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contém o novo estado de conexão de rede.

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o estado atual da conexão de rede, use o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> que indica se uma rede está disponível para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos ocorrem quando a disponibilidade da rede é alterada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contém o novo estado de conexão de rede.

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o estado atual da conexão de rede, use o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se uma rede está disponível para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> que indica se uma rede está disponível para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos ocorrem quando a disponibilidade da rede é alterada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contém o novo estado de conexão de rede.

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o estado atual da conexão de rede, use o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> propriedade.
